content: Yes, it's important for sports teams to prioritize the safety of fans, players, and staff during these times. It's understandable to miss attending games in person, but the Buccaneers, and other sports teams, are doing what they can to make sure fans can still enjoy the game as safely as possible. With the continued rollout of vaccinations, it's expected that the situation will improve, and fans will be able to enjoy live games again soon.
